docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Welcome

docs.text: mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.
docs.title: Commands

docs.text: mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Project layout

docs.text: Add new documentation page Create new .md file in docs/ at the desired location. Add entry in mkdocs.yml in nav section.
docs.title: Add new documentation page

docs.text: Create new .md file in docs/ at the desired location. Add entry in mkdocs.yml in nav section.
docs.title: Add new documentation page

docs.text: Create link to a page in the documentation Usage: [ name ]( location/of_md/from/current/file ). E.g.: local image : [local image](../images/how-to/admonition-octicons.png)
docs.title: Create link to a page in the documentation

docs.text: Usage: [ name ]( location/of_md/from/current/file ). E.g.: local image : [local image](../images/how-to/admonition-octicons.png)
docs.title: Create link to a page in the documentation

docs.text: Use markdown Cheat sheet Element Markdown Syntax Heading # H1 ## H2 ### H3 Bold **bold text** Italic *italicized text* Blockquote > blockquote Ordered List 1. First item 2. Second item 3. Third item Unordered List - First item - Second item - Third item Code `code` Horizontal Rule --- Link [title](https://www.example.com) Image ![alt text](image.jpg) Table | Syntax | Description | | --------- | ----------- | | Header | Title | | Paragraph | Text | Strikethrough \~\~The world is flat.\~\~ Note Add a note like this one: !!! Note This is a note The text used will determine the color. More details here .
docs.title: Use markdown

Third item Unordered List - First item - Second item - Third item Code `code` Horizontal Rule --- Link [title](https://www.example.com) Image ![alt text](image.jpg) Table | Syntax | Description | | --------- | ----------- | | Header | Title | | Paragraph | Text | Strikethrough \~\~The world is flat.\~\~ Note Add a note like this one: !!! Note This is a note The text used will determine the color. More details here .
